ygData.subject: Re: Ore Close to Feydark
ygData.msgSnippet: Forges are usually close to the weapons shop. Not it s not a Kiln...Check near the weapons shop... Crag, lvl 15 warrior, the Rathe ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
Forges are usually close to the weapons shop. Not it's not a Kiln...Check
near the weapons shop...

Crag, lvl 15 warrior, the Rathe

----- Original Message -----
From: <fkrueger@...>
To: <EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 06, 1999 8:57 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Ore Close to Feydark


> From: fkrueger@...
>
> I've seen a kiln, which I assume is for pottery, and a "furnace." Is this
it?

personally seen

know
